main event: One bright oval-shaped object observed in the sky, emitting a reddish glow, for approximately 40 seconds by three witnesses.
interesting points: The object was initially seen in the NE and then moved slowly across the sky to the SE., The object increased in visibility and clarity before gradually fading away., The observation took place under daylight conditions., The object's size increased as it approached before it became vague and disappeared completely., The object moved in the opposite direction of the wind during the observation.
